definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
traditionally used as phonetic for ga/also pr. [ga1]/also pr. [qie2]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

pinyin: A1 fu2 jia1 de2 luo2 chang2 shu4
